description: There is swirling debris all around you...  Six portals illuminate
the area.
37254.name: The Vortex

37219.name: {CS{we{Wr{wa{Wp{wh{Wi{wc {CP{wo{Wr{wt{Wa{wl{Ws

description: This room is filled with bookcases, which line the walls on all
sides.  The floor is clear save for a pair of pedastals.  Each
pedastal holds a large book, glowing brightly with a magical
illumination.
37209.name: {CS{we{Wr{wa{Wp{wh{Wi{wc {yLi{Ybr{Wa{Yry{y{x

description: Sometimes, the recalling magics of the members of the Order due not
work...  And in that occasion, magical or foot transport is the only
option.  This room was built to facilitate magical return to the
{CS{xa{Wn{xc{Wt{xu{War{xy.  Simply envision {cB{Ce{Mrs{Ca{ci{x in your mind and call upon your
arcane training, and you shall arrive here safely.
37217.name: {CS{we{Wr{wa{Wp{wh{Wi{wc {ySum{Ymon{Wi{Yn{yg {CC{wh{Wa{wm{Wb{we{Wr{x

description: This hallway leads to where the Seraphs outfit themselves for
battle.  The walls are engraved with images of Seraphs at war,
victorious over the demonic hordes of Baator, with a single mighty
Deva projecting an aura of calm over the battlefield.
37210.name: {xPath to {CA{wn{Wg{we{Wl{wi{Wc {yOu{Ytf{Wi{Ytt{ying

description: You stand in a small, and quite organized room.  A man, holding a
large whip, peers deeply into your eyes.  A large cage is set out to
the back of the room, containing many bird-lion type creatures.  If
you want one, why dont you ask?  To the west is the mount shop, where
you can find many other phenomenon-type creatures
37243.name: {ySe{Yra{Wph{Yic{y's {CA{wn{Wi{wm{Wa{wl {CB{wi{Wz{wz{Wa{wr{We{x

description: Shields, breastplates, and other protective armor cover the walls
here.  All of the armor is very finely made, and engraved with
beautiful markings.  However, the most exquisite suit of armor
available is strapped to a statue of a deva.  It is made of a strange
mixture of gold and mithril, and looks very strong as well as
attractive.  A strange thing of note is a glimmering tattoo above the
deva's left eye, that of an angel's wing...  It appears to be for
sale.
37212.name: {CA{wn{Wg{we{Wl{wi{Wc {yPr{Yot{We{Yct{yion{x

description: There is a massive vortex of energy here!  It stretches into the
distance, but several things are rather obvious.  First, there is a
large amount of debris...  If one were to try to enter, the swirling
debris would likely injure them severely.  Next, said debris is
swirling with great force, but always revolving towards the door.  If
you were to be hit, you would likely be thrown back here.  Finally,
and most importantly, it seems there is no exit save being hit by
debris...  Or reaching your goal.
37251.name: {CE{xn{Wt{xr{Wa{xn{Wc{xe {CT{xo {CT{xh{We{x {CV{xo{Wr{xt{We{xx{x

description: You are in a small room with cluttered shelves on all sides of the
room and a lareg {yCyprus Chest{x in the far corner.
37203.name: {bStorage Room{x

description: You have exited the vortex into a solid tunnel of energy...  Before
you lies a small altar.
{x
{8|         {CS{cer{Ma{mp{chi{Cc {MP{mo{Cr{mt{Mal {CLo{cc{Ma{mti{Co{cns          {8|{x
{8|                {CT{co {Mt{ch{Ce {MS{mo{Cu{mt{Mh                {8|{x
37240.name: {CSe{cra{Mph{ci{Cc {MPo{mrt{cal {CRo{mo{Mm{x

description: This small and heavily warded room is designed for safe and
productive meetings with visitors.  It is possible to summon someone
to this room with magic, and they can use their magic to leave, but
entrance or exit on foot is impossible except to a member of the
Order.
37218.name: {CS{we{Wr{wa{Wp{wh{Wi{wc {yVis{Yit{Wr{Yrs {CC{wh{Wa{wm{Wb{we{Wr{x

description: This, the main room of the Seraphic Order's sanctuary, is the most
beautiful place in the entire sanctuary.  The walls are engraved with
art of angelic warriors smiting corruption and evil, all in vibrant
color.  The ceiling, a large mural depicting the eternal battle
between good and evil, glows softly with a radience that is obviously
magical.  In the center of the room there is a fountain, above which
is a floating yellow crystal which sheds light on the entire chamber.
37206.name: {CS{we{Wr{wa{Wp{wh{Wi{wc {CS{wa{Wn{wc{Wt{wu{Wa{wr{Wy{x

description: You are in the midst of a swirling cloud of debris!  It prevents
you from continuing...  You can take the portal to return to the
start.
37255.name: {DS{Wwir{yling {DDe{Wbr{yis{x

description: This is a plain looking hallway.
37258.name: {CP{Wath to {CS{xe{Wr{xa{Wp{xh{Wi{xc {yH{Ye{Wali{Yn{yg{x

description: This hallway leads to the personal chambers of the Seraphs.  The
walls are engraved with images of peacefully sleeping Seraphs, leaving
their battles behind in a blissful slumber.
37220.name: {xPath to {CS{we{Wr{wa{Wp{wh{Wi{wc {yHo{Yu{Ws{Yi{yng{x

description: This is the hallway leading to the Transportation area of the
Sanctuary.  Along the walls are engraven images of the legions of
light emerging from magical gates to lay waste to the followers of
evil.
37215.name: {xPath to {CS{xe{Wr{xa{Wp{xh{Wi{xc{x {CTr{can{Msp{mor{Mta{cti{Con{x

description: This conference room is lined with beautifully carved statues of
creatures of the upper planes.  Each statue is painted in lifelike
colors, painstakingly detailed.  The oak table in the center of the
room is also magnificent, with etchings so delicately done it is
almost impossible to feel them when sliding a hand over the table.
The seats around the table are comfortable, and spaced evenly around
the circle-shaped table.  Evidently this room is meant to be used for
quite important gatherings, whether they be related to the battle
against evil, or simply a social arrangement.
37230.name: {CC{wo{Wn{wf{We{wr{We{wn{Wc{we {yR{Yoo{ym{x

description: A dimential shift opens and allows access to your hall.
37231.name: Seraphic Backdoor

description: This intersection leads to the transportation sections of the
Sanctuary.  To the west you may find the Summoning and Relocation
Chamber.  East is the Visitor's Chamber.  South is the Sanctuary's
portal room.
37216.name: {CS{we{Wr{wa{Wp{wh{Wi{wc {yTra{Yns{Wpo{Yrta{ytion{x

description: This small room contains a portal leading to the main room of the
Sanctuary.  However, entry to this room is forbidden except to
Seraphs, so any other "visitors" had best watch their step.
37201.name: {CS{xe{Wr{xa{Wp{xh{Wi{xc{x {CS{xa{Wn{xc{Wt{xu{War{xy Guard Room

description: There is swirling debris all around you...  Six portals illuminate
the area.
37253.name: The Vortex

description: This small room is filled with bubbling potions of rather uncertain
intent.  Along the walls are racks of the more commonly used potions,
such as healing and mana elixirs.  A few of the potions here are safe
to use for the non-alchemically minded, and are thus for sale to all
Seraphs.
37213.name: {CA{wn{Wg{we{Wl{wi{Wc {yEl{Yi{Wx{Yi{yrs{x

description: You are now standing in a small temple dedicated to Nali.  In the
center of the altar is a miniature statue of Nali, covered with
precious stones...  It appears to have great value.
Cost of these rooms equals about the cost of a PHouse, or something?
37225.name: To clan member rooms

description: This is the room of Jovie's brother, {cI{8r{co{8n {wman{x.  There is nothing
important in this room except for the large man standing in the
corner.
37204.name: {cI{8R{cO{8N {wMan's {cRoom{x

description: You have entered a small room with nothing descript in it besides
the nice and tidy {bToilet{x.
37205.name: {mThe Bathroom{x

description: This is a plain looking hallway.
37259.name: {CP{Wath to {CS{xe{Wr{xa{Wp{xh{Wi{xc {yH{Ye{Wali{Yn{yg{x

description: This is where the members of the Seraphic Order live while not
fighting evil.  East leads to Quigon's room, while south is Toxicosys'
room, and north is Thayer's domicile.
37221.name: {CS{we{Wr{wa{Wp{wh{Wi{wc {yHo{Yu{Ws{Yi{yng{x

description: This hallway leads to the area where the Seraphs amass their
knowledge.  The walls are engraved with images of young Seraphs
sparring, with a large color engraving of a wise elder Deva reading a
tome of forgotten lore.
37207.name: {xPath to {CS{we{Wr{wa{Wp{wh{Wi{wc {yTe{Yac{Wh{Yin{ygs{x

description: You stand on a large cloud, bright lights surround you as a large
man appears before you his voice booms, as he shows you a small pen,
containing the most beautful creatures youve ever seen.  Bright {Ww{wh{Wi{wt{We{x
wings, {Yg{yo{Yl{yd{Ye{yn{x horns, it must be a Unicorn.  The small man closes the
pen, and then peers down at you, like..  He wants something.
37241.name: {CS{we{Wr{w{Wa{wp{Wh{wi{Wc {CS{Wt{wa{Wb{wl{We{ws{x

description: You are in the midst of a swirling cloud of debris!  It prevents
you from continuing...  You can take the portal to return to the
start.
37256.name: {DS{Wwir{yling {DDe{Wbr{yis{x

description: This room is covered with padding, all of which is inscribed with
runes and arcane symbols.  The walls and the padding are enchanted
with spells that keep them clean and, most importantly, repaired.
This appears to be the perfect room for training yourself in the
fighting or magical arts.
37202.name: {CS{we{Wr{wa{Wp{wh{Wi{wc {yTr{Yai{Wn{Yin{yg{x

description: There is swirling debris all around you...  Six portals illuminate
the area.
37252.name: The Vortex

description: Hanging from the ceiling are hundreds of weapons, mostly swords but
with the occasional weapon of another type.  All the weapons save one
are expertly forged...  That one, however, was not forged at all.  It
is a pair of what appear to be gloves, glowing with a divine aura...
They seem very powerful, but as you look at them you somehow sense
that skill with them matters not on martial arts, but for some reason
on your skill with flails.
37214.name: {CA{wn{Wg{we{Wl{wi{Wc {yF{Yur{yy{x

description: This room is charged with magical energies, allowing rapid healing
of the Seraphs.  It is also safe for Seraphs, and no enemies may
enter.
37260.name: {CS{xe{Wr{xa{Wp{xh{Wi{xc {yH{Ye{Wali{Yn{yg{x

description: You appear to be in a small bookshop-themed room, paper and scrolls
everywhere, followed by small containers of ink, some half spilled
over the carpet and the rest stacked ontop of each other You face the
back of a man, who looks like he has stayed up all night, doing what
he loves.
37250.name: {CA {CS{wm{Wa{wl{Wl {CO{wf{Wf{wi{Wc{we{x

description: This is an intersection connecting the places of learning in the
Sanctuary.  New and old Seraphs alike can learn much from the library
to the south, train their fighting and magical skills to the north,
and have debates and meetings to the west.
37208.name: {CS{we{Wr{wa{Wp{wh{Wi{wc {yTe{Yac{Wh{Yin{ygs{x

description: The sign reads, in gold trim: This portal is for use only by the
members of the Seraphic Order.  Entry by all others is not only
foolhardy but most likely lethal.
Standing before you is a door, with a swirling portal flowing
inside of it.  At the side of the door is a large, important-looking
{Rsign{x, and it would be best to read it before stepping into the portal.
37200.name: {xEntrance to the {CS{xe{Wr{xa{Wp{xh{Wi{xc{x {CS{xa{Wn{xc{Wt{xu{War{xy

description: This hall leads to the rooms where Seraphs may outfit themselves in
whichever equipment they need.  North they may find superb weaponry to
aid in their eternal fight.  East is the alchemist's abode, where
Seraphs will find all kinds of magical elixirs to help in their fight
against evil.  West is where members of the Order can clothe
themselves in fine armor.
37211.name: {CA{wn{Wg{we{Wl{wi{Wc {yOu{Ytf{Wi{Ytt{ying

37253.room_name: A {yt{Yi{Wr{Ye{yd{x man sits here, {Cw{wi{Wt{wh{x his head slant on the desk.

description: The {bLord{x of the {rHarpers{x stands before you.
37200.room_name: Before you stands the {bLord{x of the {rHarpers.{x
37200.name: {RJ{ro{Rv{ri{Re{x~

F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
Elatos is a tall, strong man, hardened from years of thankless
battle against the criminal element in Calimshan.  After a rather
unpleasant battle, he was no longer left in any adventuring condition,
but he continued to train in hopes of being able to make a difference
once more. 
 
He has found his chance.
 
Now that he is a trainer for the Seraphic Order, he can help the
cause while staying out of the battles that he used to fight, at the
loss of his health and youth.
 
He is loyal, helpful, and knowledgable about the ways of war... 
And is thus a good companion in the fight against corruption and evil.
37202.room_name: A tall warrior stands here, ready to train the {CS{xe{Wr{xa{Wph{xs{x.
37202.name: {WE{Dl{Mat{Do{Ws{x~
subroutines:
M HPCNT 37202 10~
M KILL 37200 100~
M ACT 37201 you! -=~
M ACT 37208 powerless~
M ACT 37207 and sends your weapon flying!~
M ACT 37209 white aura around~

37206.room_name: A petite woman stands here, with a tattoo of a wing on her face.
37206.name: {CS{xo{Wni{xa{x~

description:
{mYo{Mn{Cti{Ma{msu{x is a woman from the eastern lands, well trained in the art
of fighting with a quarterstaff.  She came to the Order in search of
{WE{Dl{Mat{Do{Ws{x, who she had heard many stories of during her stay in
Calimshan.  When they met, she realized that {WE{Dl{Mat{Do{Ws{x was every bit as
good as the stories said, and decided to stay on as his assistant. 
The assistant has since passed the master in skill and fighting power.
But if {WE{Dl{Mat{Do{Ws{x was still in adventuring condition, he would no doubt be
her equal.
37209.room_name: A slender woman stands here, holding a staff.
37209.name: {mYo{Mn{Cti{Ma{msu{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M KILL 37204 100~
M ACT 37205 and sends your weapon flying!~
M ACT 37206 our punch~

description:
This jolly-looking man has been hired by the Order to serve food
and drinks during their meetings.  He quite enjoys his job, as he is
allowed to sample as much of the product as he wants as long as he can
be ready to serve at a moment's notice.  
 
If someone wished to be able to get another kind of drink from the
fountain, all they would have to do is say {x'please serve (drink){x'.
The available drinks are:
milk   coffee   white wine   elvish wine
icewine   rose wine   champagne
 
If you would like a cup, simply say "please give me a cup".

If you would like some food, just say "please give me (food)"
Available foods are:
37210.room_name: A short, plump man stands here, ready to serve food.
37210.name: {rC{Ra{Ys{Go{Yn{Ra{rn{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M SPEECH 37217 please give me a cup~
M SPEECH 37216 please serve champagne~
M SPEECH 37215 please serve white wine~
M SPEECH 37214 please serve rose wine~
M SPEECH 37213 please serve elvish wine~
M SPEECH 37212 please serve milk~
M SPEECH 37211 please serve coffee~
M SPEECH 37210 please serve icewine~

description:
{cSo{Cl{Mo{Cn{cas{x is not a fighter.  He is strong, fast, and agile...  But
also a pacifist.  He is equally skilled at magic and weapons, and at
those he is more skilled than most experts in their respective fields.
He decided the best way to serve good without becoming directly
involved was to provide the training that the Seraphs need.  
 
He has proven himself very capable in that respect, and can help you
train your physical or mental attributes, practice your skills, or even
teach you new ones.
37211.room_name: A tall man named {cSo{Cl{Mo{Cn{cas{x stands here, ready to teach.
